snippet.title: 4  Automate the Quality Gate
snippet.description:
🤖 Automate the Quality Gate
🎥 Episode 4 of 10 — Watch This Before You Ship Again

“If it’s not in the pipeline… it’s not in your process.”
You can tell your team to check security.
To run the tests.
To follow the standards.
But if it’s manual—it’s optional.
And if it’s optional—it gets missed.

🛑 Manual quality gates fail because people are human.
✅ Automation fixes that.

At NKD Agility, we help teams build real, enforceable quality gates into their pipelines:
🔐 Security scans
🧠 Static analysis
🧪 Automated testing
📏 Linting + code quality checks
No check. No deploy. No exceptions.

Because true quality isn’t about remembering—it’s about making it impossible to forget.

📈 Want delivery pipelines you can trust? Visit https://www.nkdagility.com

👇 Tap to watch now. Follow the full 10-part series.
#DevOps #AgileDelivery #DefinitionOfDone #PipelineAutomation #SoftwareQuality #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #ContinuousDelivery #EngineeringExcellence #RedefiningDone
